mapper.insert: insert into ecs_delivery_goods (rec_id, delivery_id, goods_id, product_id, product_sn, goods_name, brand_name, goods_sn, is_real, extension_code, parent_id, send_number, goods_attr) values (#{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isReal,jdbcType=BIT}, #{extensionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendNumber,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{goodsAttr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
